name: Rollex
description:
Rollex is a simple 3-D game.  Game is based at avoid the Ball (player) from collide with hurdles/blocks. At Start, Game consist at 10 Levels (More is coming!).

How To Play:

Keys:       W / A /  D

  • W   --->       Move Forward
  • D   --->       Move Right
  • A   --->       Move Left

 Features:

  • Easy To Play
  • Good Environment
  • Excellent Game Controller
  • Simple Game Mechanics

Upcoming:

  • Sounds in Game
  • More Levels
  • Choice to Play any level
  • Some Improvements & bug fixes
